title: The Dolmetsch Story. Part 3. Making music
creator_credit: Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Fanelodge Productions
brief_description: Final part in a three part series. This film is devoted to the music played and recorded in the Dolmetsch family and also in their museum. It captures the authentic sound of various instruments, which include violas, recorders, harpsicords, virginals, octavinas, spinets and fortepianos. Suitable for secondary school level.
